name: Vending Machine Mayhem
description:
Imagine yourself in a futuristic Japan.

It is night, you are on your way home and you feel thirsty.

Lucky for you, you spot two vending machines, one on each side of the street.

However, before you can make your choice, both jump up, turn into fighting robots and duke it out for the privilige to sell to you.

Thats what this game is.

You play as a vending machine fighting robot.

This game is a top-down, twin stick shooter for local pvp.

It has several game modes and maps. In general you fight the other vending machines with differing goals depending on the game mode.

For an in depth walk-through, watch

This game is a student project made at Digital Arts and Entertainment, Howest.
Art: Hannah Geilen and Tim Wilmsen
Programming: Olof Aviron-Violet, Jordan Sommer and Nakisa Bastami
